attributes.action: Make it compulsory for all UK shoe shops to stock small sizes of womens shoes starting from size 1.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Almost all shoe shops in  the UK only stock womens shoes from size 3+. This is descrimination. Other countries have been selling womens shoes in small sizes for years, it is about time the UK caught up. The argument most companies put up, is that it is too expensive to make these sizes, too bad. Hundreds of women in the UK have a shoe size of 2 and under, and we NEED shoes now!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
